job description:
• Work closely with internal customers and subject matter experts to develop and maintain technical training documentation for the MuleSoft platform.
  • Provide personalized support and training to internal customers on the MuleSoft platform and enterprise standards.
  • Conduct training in a variety of formats to meet the needs of the audience (train-the-trainer, classroom, Remote, etc.)
  • Build and maintain professional relationships by consistently delivering exceptional service and exceeding expectations.
  • Collaborate with team members and internal customers to share knowledge and identify areas for improvement.
  • Act as subject matter expect for MuleSoft platform and enterprise standards.
  • Monitor emerging trends within the MuleSoft platform.
  • Cross Train with COE Engineers.
  • Maintains Appropriate Procedure Documentation.
  • Performs all other duties as assigned by Management.
Additional Job Functions and Skills:
  • Demonstrated ability to work with internal customers to design, implement and maintain MuleSoft platform training for the enterprise.
  • Must have experience in written and verbal communication and should be capable of communicating effectively to all levels within the organization on technical content and concepts.
  • Individual must be open to learning the MuleSoft platform and acting as a subject matter expert within the organization.
  • Must be a self-starter who is highly motivated, reliable, detail oriented, and driven to produce high quality work.
  • Must thrive in a fast-pace environment and be willing to learn on the job in a continuously evolving environment.
Education/Experience:
  • Bachelors Degree with a minimum of 2 years experience as a Software Engineer or Software Developer (OR) Masters Degree with a minimum of 1 year experience in Computer Science, Information Science, Technical Communication or related field.
  • Technical Training experience and exposure to online consumer lending or similar industry preferred.
